overview: When Bridgette B checks up on her step-daughter later, she finds her napping. She lays on the bed next to her and snags her phone, discovering the scandalous pictures Darcie Dolce took earlier! As Chloe Cherry takes whiff after glorious whiff, she doesn't notice Cherie DeVille walking towards the house. What's worse is that Cherie can see her through the window. She wonders if she could come in, but Chloe is so embarrassed that she mumbles incoherently.
title: Sexy Siesta
